name: Gaia Online - Dark Gaia Header
description: [Firefox & Chrome] Gaia Online - A new look for Gaia header has arrived ! A new blasting apperance for the background's header, navigator bar, expandable menus, menu icons, achievements, daily chance icon, HUD, yellow notifier, the background of the page and content and even the cursor. Everything that is the same height as your avatar has been changed.
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml); @-moz-document domain("gaiaonline.com") { #gaia_content .user_status_message .status p, #gaia_content .user_status_message .status div, #interest_matching{color:#000000!important; font-style: normal!important; font-family: arial!important;} #gaia_content .left, #gaia_content .right, #rewardMessage .bd .dailyRewardContent h3, #rewardMessage .bd .dailyRewardContent h4, #rewardMessage .bd #errorMessage h3, #rewardMessage .bd .dailyRewardContent strong, #rewardMessage .bd #errorMessage strong, #rewardMessage .bd .dailyRewardContent em, #rewardMessage .bd .dailyRewardContent h3, #rewardMessage .bd .dailyRewardContent h4, #rewardMessage .bd #errorMessage h3, #rewardMessage .bd .dailyRewardContent p, #rewardMessage .bd #errorMessage p, #rewardMessage .bd .dailyRewardContent .closePanel, #rewardMessage .bd .dailyRewardContent .rewardImage, .section .date{color: #000000!important; font-style: normal!important;}html, body, #ach_menu .bd .unlocked{cursor: url(http://cur.cursors-4u.net/cursors/cur-7/cur610.cur), progress!important;} a, a:hover{cursor: url(http://cur.cursors-4u.net/cursors/cur-7/cur608.cur), progress!important;} .megamenu-section-trigger, .mega-menu .megamenu-standard-menu .megamenu-section-trigger, .mega-menu .megamenu-extended-menu .megamenu-section-trigger, .mega-menu .megamenu-no-panel .megamenu-section-trigger{cursor: url(http://cur.cursors-4u.net/cursors/cur-7/cur608.cur), progress!important;} #gaia_header .header_content #sponsored-treat{cursor: url(http://cur.cursors-4u.net/cursors/cur-7/cur608.cur), progress!important;} #gaia_header .header_content #achievements-unlocked-list, #ach_menu .ach ul li{cursor: url(http://cur.cursors-4u.net/cursors/cur-7/cur608.cur), progress!important;} #gsearch_ac.inactive #gsearch_ac_input, input, textarea, select{cursor: url(http://cur.cursors-4u.net/cursors/cur-7/cur609.cur), progress!important;} #gaia_menu_bar{border-left: 1px solid #000000 !important; box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #282828 inset !important; border-right: 1px solid #000000 !important; box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #282828 inset !important; width:99.8%!important;} .header_content{border-left: 1px solid #000000 !important; box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #282828 inset !important; border-right: 1px solid #000000 !important; box-shadow: 0 0 0 1px #282828 inset !important; width:99.8%!important;} body > #rareevent{width:0%!important; display: none!important;} .time-day div.town-barton .header_content, .time-dawn div.town-barton .header_content, .time-dusk div.town-barton .header_content{background: url(http://i.imgur.com/NGPVG.png) !important;} .time-night div.town-barton .header_content{background: url(http://i.imgur.com/NGPVG.png) repeat-x scroll left bottom transparent !important;} #gaia_header .header_content .gaiaLogo a {background: url(http://i1140.photobucket.com/albums/n574/Prince_Akira_Takizawa/CSS/DarkGL.png)!important; background-repeat: no-repeat!important;} html .index, html .mygaia, html .shopping, html .community, html .world, html .games, html #yuievtautoid-0.bbcode-swap-blocked-group{background: url(http://i.imgur.com/u6iuk.png) !important; background-size:100% 100%!important; background-repeat:repeat-x!important;} body{background: none!important; font-family: 'Segoe UI'!important;} #gaia_header #color_switcher_wrap.grey .header_content .hud-sprite, .hud-item a,
